meanings.definition: of poor quality or low standard
meanings.sent1: The old car was shittier than the new one.
meanings.sent2: This movie is shittier than the one we watched last week.
meanings.sent3: The shittier sandwich fell apart before I could take a bite.
meanings.sent4: The shittier weather made the picnic less enjoyable.
meanings.sent5: The shittier paint job on the house was peeling off already.

meanings.definition: more unpleasant or disagreeable than something else
meanings.sent1: The shittier smell in the bathroom made me want to leave quickly.
meanings.sent2: I would choose the shittier task over dealing with that person again.
meanings.sent3: The shittier taste of the medicine made me cringe.
meanings.sent4: The shittier news made the situation even more difficult to handle.
meanings.sent5: The shittier noise from the construction site was unbearable.
